name: The Jungle Adventures
description:
Shambler Monster has captured Aerith's Prince. You have to help Aerith rescue the Prince.
Get ultra latest POWER-HIT Jungle Adventures Run with power-ups & Amazing challenging Levels for Android now!

Face the unknown dangers and fear is waiting you! ! !
Jungle Adventures - free game is a action packed game where you need to destroy enemies, cross different obstacles, overcome dangers while collecting as many coins & jewels as you can to score the highest..

Game Features -
***** mousie's world - Homeland,Underground , Sky ,High, ..
***** Achievements & a lot of fun
***** Lightweight Game to reduce your data costs ;-)
***** Good Quality Graphics
***** Very amazing game control
***** Multiple Levels Challenging to cross in each world
